title: Hi! Welcome to My Homepage
text:
I am a final-year Ph.D.Â student in the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics at Monash University, under the supervision of Professor Jackie Li, Dr.Â Hamza Hanbali, Dr.Â Jessica Leung, and Professor Brett Inder. My research focuses on longevity risk management and designing pension solutions.
In addition to my research, I am also working as a teaching associate in the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics at Monash University, Australia.
